MONUMENT_ARCANUM_AETHERCOURT.MONUMENT_ARCANUM_AETHERCOURT_DESC: A center dedicated to the arcane arts with buildings both for general study and specialized fields, including towers, groves and sanctums.

PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T1.PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T1_DESC: Rumours about a new Aether Court start to spread.

PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T2.PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T2_DESC: Scholars have started talking about your research.

PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T3.PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T3_DESC: Third tier in the Arcanum Estate progress tree.

PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T4.PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T4_DESC: Fourth tier in the Arcanum Estate progress tree.

PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T5.PROGRESS_TIER_ARCANUM_T5_DESC: Fifth tier in the Arcanum Estate progress tree.

UNLOCKABLE_ARCANUM_AETHERCOURT.UNLOCKABLE_ARCANUM_AETHERCOURT_DESC: Unlocks the Aether Court monument, which lets you delve into magic.

UNLOCKABLE_ARCANUM_AETHERCOURT_TREASURY.UNLOCKABLE_ARCANUM_AETHERCOURT_TREASURY_: Unlocks the Treasury for your Aether Court.

JOB_AETHERCOURT_SCHOLAR.JOB_AETHERCOURT_SCHOLAR_DESC: Researches the science and fundamentals of magic.

STATUS_AETHERCOURT_ASPIRANT.STATUS_AETHERCOURT_ASPIRANT_GENERIC_DESC: Aspirants are eager to study and learn about magic, aether and the arcane arts.
